data.title: LG TV Channels List, Plans, Devices & More [2024]
data.meta_description: With an LG Smart TV, you can watch a good number of channels for free. Here is everything you need to know about LG Channels for LG TVs.
data.text:
Pin

What’s better than having a cable connection to watch your TV shows and movies? A better and cheaper streaming service. However, if you are someone that owns an LG Smart TV, you will be able to make the best out of it. Because these are LG’s own Smart TVs running on webOS, you can watch more than 600 channels for free. Yes, for free.

Here is everything you need to know about LG TV Channels service regarding the supported devices, available regions, and the whole channel lineup.

Table of Contents

LG TV Plus Streaming Service with Free Channels

The TV channels that you will be able to stream via LG Channels Plus are completely free of cost. This is a service that is baked right into your TVs. The LG Channels are powered by XUMO.

To access LG Channels all you need to do is to activate the service and you will be able to watch your favorite channels right away. Even though this is a service that is present on these TVs by default, you will have to manually enable it in order to access it. And no, you do not need to enter or create an account, personal info, or credit card details to use this service.

How to Watch LG TV Channels

For WebOS 3.0 to WebOS 5.0:

Turn on your LG Smart TV. Make sure you have the remote with you and your TV is connected to WiFi.

Now, press the Home button on your TV remote.

Navigate over to Settings > Channels and then select LG Channels.

The TV will check if there is any update available. If there are updates, download and install them.

Now, simply toggle the switch to On in order to enable LG Channels (Plus).

With the service enabled, you can simply watch your free channels right away.

You can press the Down or Up buttons to change your channels.

For WebOS 6.0, WebOS 22, and WebOS 23:

On newer LG TVs, the service is enabled by default, but if you are unable to use this feature, you can easily enable the service, by heading over to Settings > Support > Privacy & Terms > User Agreements > LG Channel Services. Here you can activate the LG Channels service.

LG TV Plus Channels – Supported Devices and Regions

Now, this is a service exclusive only to LG’s lineup of Smart TVs. If you are using an LG smart TV that was released between 2012 and 2018, the TV should be running on webOS 4. But, if you are using an LG Smart TV that was released in 2019 and newer, the TV should be running on webOS 4.5 or newer.

As of now, LG TV Plus is available only in the USA. It might slowly make its way over to other parts of the world. Now, let’s take a look at the LG TV Channels list.

LG TV Channels List with IP Channel Numbers

Here’s the channels list with their IP channel numbers followed by a brief category-wise list.

This concludes everything you need to know about LG TV Channels. If you are someone who has an LG Smart TV and lives in the US, having LG TV Plus as your streaming service is the best value. You do not need to pay for anything extra at all. Simply connect your LG Smart TV to the internet and enjoy all of your favorite stuff right away.

You May Also Like – List of channels compatible with Google TV

If you are someone who uses LG TV with TV Plus Streaming service to stream free channels, share with us your experience about the service in the comments section below.

Joshua D'souza

Enjoy games, 90's hip-hop, and tech. Loves exploring the infinite world of laptops and food. Every ready to provide assistance in anything that rocks his boat. Will gladly enjoy capturing memories through various lenses. Worked previously at PiunikaWeb as an author and researcher.
